thread.title: Russell Simmons' card glitch keeps thousands from their cash
thread.title_full: Russell Simmons' card glitch keeps thousands from their cash

title: Russell Simmons' card glitch keeps thousands from their cash
text: > Top News Russell Simmons' card glitch keeps thousands from their cash FILE - In this May 21, 2015 file photo, Russell Simmons arrives at The17th Annual CAST From Slavery to Freedom Gala in Los Angeles. Thousands of customers of pre-paid debit cards backed by Simmons remain without access to their money more than a week after technical problems first began plaguing the cards. The problems with the RushCard started Oct.12, when a software upgrade in the transaction processing system caused many accounts to show a zero balance or left customers unable to access to their funds. (Photo by Rob Latour/Invision/AP, File)
